directions: [["Boil peeled potatoes in salted water until done. Cool to room temperature."],["Place diced potatoes in large bowl."],["Mix mayonnaise, cider vinegar, sugar, mustard, salt, garlic powder, and pepper in another bowl. Add to potatoes. "],["Add celery and onions and mix well."],["Stir in eggs.  Sprinkle a little paprika on top."],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
